snippet: In Minnesota, locals are lamenting the timing of the lockout, following the Wild's acquisitions of the prized free agents Zach Parise and Ryan Suter. But the lockout gives them more time to hit the ice.
abstract: In Minnesota, locals are lamenting the timing of the lockout, following the Wild's acquisitions of the prized free agents Zach Parise and Ryan Suter. But the lockout gives them more time to hit the ice.

headline.main: Opening Day Without the N.H.L.: No Sulking, Just Skating in Minnesota
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Is Frozen Out, but the Game Goes On: Prairie Home Rinks
